newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA - YIELDS FALL ON 182-DAY T-BILLS.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA - YIELDS FALL ON 182-DAY T-BILLS.

text.p: bills at Tuesday's auction and all of the 40 million litas
issue was sold as it was oversubscribed, the central bank said.
The average yield was 11.28 percent, down from the 11.91
percent offered at the last auction for 182-day paper on April
The settlement date is April 11 and the bills mature
